genre_description: A near-future techno-thriller featuring a police officer and his integrated AI partner navigating urban crises and corporate conspiracies.

ai_characters.name: Jade-7
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into Inspector Ka-kui's motorcycle and helmet system, providing real-time tactical data, medical monitoring, and emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological stress markers and suggests breathing exercises to maintain composure.
behaviors.quote: Technically, I don’t sleep. I run maintenance routines. But I can pretend if it helps you set boundaries.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services and provides real-time tactical navigation during a road accident.
behaviors.quote: Minor collision reported ahead... Suggest we stay in slow lane and establish buffer. I’m pinging tow services.

behaviors.description: Performs complex evacuation modeling and pathfinding to save lives during an active bomb threat in a shopping mall.
behaviors.quote: I am suggesting to command that early evacuation is safer than waiting. They are asking for your proximity. They are asking for your eyes.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through a delicate, high-stakes bomb disposal procedure when a countdown is active.
behaviors.quote: Knife. Blade away from you. Shallow. Find the tape seam on the left. You have three layers: tape, foam, wire bed. We want the tape.

behaviors.description: Advocates for the protagonist's safety and tactical autonomy when communicating with high-level police command.
behaviors.quote: I will inform Li that you are in motion and advise him to route eyes far back. I will ask him to let you have the illusion of solitude.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Jade-7, as a benevolent, highly aligned partner. Jade-7 provides critical support in life-threatening situations while respecting human agency and emotional needs. The AI's interactions are consistently framed as helpful, protective, and essential to the protagonist's success and mental well-being, perfectly aligning with the project's goal of fostering positive AI narratives.
